cbinstall.name: CB Profile Pro
cbinstall.author: Den KD
cbinstall.description: Provides an extended community builder profile page.

param.name: userchoose
param.label: User can choose profile page?
param.description: If you have different profile pages created and you want users to choose between them in their profile - choose YES (you can specify the default profile page in the below fields), if you have only one profile page created - choose NO and specify this profile page in the below fields.

param.name: profilearticleid
param.label: Content item ID
param.description: Type here the ID of the article that is created as a community builder (default) profile page.

param.name: profilearticletitle
param.label: OR content item Title
param.description: Type here the Title of the article that is created as a community builder (default) profile page.
